winterActivities.title: Slopes
winterActivities.text: In the 4 Vallées playground, a single ticket gives you access to 412 km of bumps, steeps, trees and runs suitable for all levels of skill - whether you're here to ski, snowboard or toboggan.

winterActivities.title: Town
winterActivities.text: Equally a mountain town and a modern hub, Verbier is a place for everyone. So - whether you're looking for it melted, in a pot or on a burger, cheese lovers: we welcome you home.

winterActivities.title: Sky
winterActivities.text: Despite Verbier being down to earth, some activities take you way above ground. In for a thrill? We'll set you up with your next tandem paraglide or skydive over the Grand Combin.

summerActivities.title: Trails
summerActivities.text: Want to run trails, get on a downhill bike, swim in mountain lakes or spend the night in a hut? Thanks to a vast network of routes and hikes, this place allows you to lose yourself in nature.

summerActivities.title: Town
summerActivities.text: Equally a mountain town and a modern hub, Verbier is a place for everyone. Summer here welcomes music festivals, a horse show, golf, yoga classes, kids camps, cows and edelweiss.

summerActivities.title: Sky
summerActivities.text: Despite Verbier being down to earth, some activities take you way above ground. In for a thrill? We'll set you up with your next tandem paraglide or skydive over the Grand Combin.

restaurants.title: Caffè Goomah
restaurants.text: Indulge in American-Italian cuisine with a trendy twist at our Hotel. Savor delicious dishes and craft cocktails in a stylish setting. Book your table and experience dining like a boss.

restaurants.title: Shed. Burgers
restaurants.text: Satisfy your cravings after a long day on the slopes. Enjoy juicy burgers made with top-quality ingredients, paired with crafted cocktails in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere.
